messages.subject: Re: Yahoo advertisements
messages.msgSnippet: ... constant ... Thanks a lot Wendy!!! As I was reading your post, there it was, the lock I had barely noticed before, transformed into an EAR!! With that pick
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "wew992001" <wew99@s...> wrote:
> Hi,
> does anyone else read their yahoo groups messages on the
> website? If so, have you noticed the KWICK PICK ad? I wondered
> because it totally grosses me out! It is difficult for me to
> read the messages, because as I am reading, there is a pick drilling
> into a keyhole, that reminds me of an ear, so there is this
constant
> ear drilling thing going on.
>
> Wendy
> wew99@s...

Thanks a lot Wendy!!!
As I was reading your post, there it was, the lock I had barely
noticed before, transformed into an EAR!! With that pick jabbing into
it! LOL
Joanna-who reads at the website. ;-)

messages.subject: Yahoo advertisements
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, does anyone else read their yahoo groups messages on the website? If so, have you noticed the KWICK PICK  ad? I wondered because it totally grosses me out!
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
does anyone else read their yahoo groups messages on the
website? If so, have you noticed the KWICK PICK ad? I wondered
because it totally grosses me out! It is difficult for me to
read the messages, because as I am reading, there is a pick drilling
into a keyhole, that reminds me of an ear, so there is this constant
ear drilling thing going on.

Wendy
wew99@...
